title: Rewrite About page for grid-website
body:
- Expand Grid description to clarify goal of a cross-industry tool set
  Note: Some content is derived from the Hyperledger Grid project page at
  https://www.hyperledger.org/projects/grid

- Add image from Grid proposal

- Add details of component types, with examples (mention GS1, Grid Track and Trace, Pike, and the grid CLI)

- Add "How to participate" paragraph with link to more info in the FAQ (in a separate PR)

- Add "Source code" with summary of grid, grid-contrib, and grid-rfcs repos

Signed-off-by: Anne Chenette <chenette@bitwise.io>

title: Update home page for grid-website
body:
- Move "Hyperledger Grid" title to banner image

- Rewrite content: Update the high-level overview; add "open source"
  and "we welcome contributors" blurbs

- Add links to other website pages, the grid repo, and "Grid in the news"
  (the hyperledger-grid category on hyperledger.org)

Other information (from the previous home page) will move to the About page
in a separate PR.

Signed-off-by: Anne Chenette <chenette@bitwise.io>

title: Reformat, rewrite, and expand FAQ for grid-website
body:
- Fix FAQ presentation, organization, and usability
  - Add direct links to questions from main page
  - Retitle and reorganize the general page
  - Remove mini-nav buttons:
    (a) There's only one FAQ page right now
    (b) "Next" and "Previous" are not meaningful in a FAQ
    Will handle nav differently if the FAQ ever gets too large.

- Rewrite "What is Hyperledger Grid" to match new overview on home page (in a separate PR)

- Add more FAQ questions/answers

- Rewrite "Contributing to this FAQ" for clarity

Signed-off-by: Anne Chenette <chenette@bitwise.io>

title: Update Community pages for Grid website
body:
Community:
- Add a high-level summary of Grid "areas" for which we encourage feedback
- Expand each link's text for friendliness and clarity

Code of Conduct:
- Correct link to Hyperledger's code of contact page (it moved)
- Also fix grammar in the first sentence

Contributing:
- Add entry for grid-contrib under "Ways you can contribute"
- Make minor wording changes and link fixes for clarity and friendliness
- Fix document structure (add Header markup)

Joining the Discussion:
 - Add info about a Linux Foundation ID
- Reword for friendliness
- Remove headers (they take up too much space)
- Fix blockquote format issue

title: Make lists conform to the standard style
body:
By default, list-lines and wrapped-list-lines are indented equally.
The theme in use eliminates all padding, including the indentation
of lists. This applies default padding and settings to lists. BIP-379

Signed-off-by: Sutrannu <bbetts@bitwise.io>

title: Update and expand Docs page on Grid website
body:
- Add intro text

- Clarify "nightly master" for non-developers

- Add note on incubation status and frequent doc changes

Signed-off-by: Anne Chenette <chenette@bitwise.io>

title: Change twitter link to point to Grid tweets
Update Jenkins paths
body:
The URL paths in Jenkins are significantly different from the various
Sawtooth projects.

Signed-off-by: Sutrannu <bbetts@bitwise.io>

title: Expand and improve grid-website README
body:
- Add repo description with link to grid.hyperledger.org
- Retitle sections
- Clarify build procedure, number steps, and turn linter info into note
- Correct and clarify info about website content
- Fix license wording and add links

Signed-off-by: Anne Chenette <chenette@bitwise.io>

title: Initial grid site
body: This content is live currently at: https://grid.hyperledger.org/
